parameter.name: haId
parameter.label: Home Appliance ID
parameter.description: Unique identifier representing a specific home appliance.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Address of home appliance (hostname or IP)

parameter.name: connectionType
parameter.label: Connection Type
parameter.description: Type of encryption, whether to use AES with websocket or use TLS encrypted websocket.

parameter.name: connectionRetryDelay
parameter.label: Reconnect Delay
parameter.description: Specifies the amount of time (in minutes) to wait before attempting to reconnect after a disconnection occurs, whether due to an offline device or a connection error.
